[Sabotage at the Brass Citadel](/sabotageAtTheBrassCitadel/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Hood (Deadfire){{!}}Hood |body = Padded Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Padded Armor |weapon1 = Fist (Deadfire){{!}}Fist |internalname = NPC_RD_RDC_Powderguard_Captain |guid = 5a440d86-5c60-4a03-b0ae-c3fa9119b8de }} '''Powderhouse Captain''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background She manages the powderhouse operations and security. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [Taking Out the Traders](/takingOutTheTraders/) * [Sabotage at the Brass Citadel](/sabotageAtTheBrassCitadel/) |none = |other = * If you're spotted upon entering the area, you must past a [check](/powderhouse/) otherwise you'll be kicked out. }} [Category:The Brass Citadel characters](/categoryTheBrassCitadelCharacters/)
